## Description

Explain why this enhancement would be beneficial and how it improves the project.

## Proposed Solution
Describe your proposed solution or approach to implement the enhancement.

## Alternatives
List any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or references that might help in understanding the enhancement.

---
**Checklist:**

## References Searched (required)
Provide links or references to any resources, documentation, or examples you have reviewed that are relevant to this enhancement request.
